Post.title: Review on Intent Classification and Slot Filling
Post._content:
Natural Language Understanding, NLUNLPIntentSlot - - SVM, Decision Tree - End-to-End ## ### [NLPCC 2018 Task4](http://tcci.ccf.org.cn/conference/2018/taskdata.php) - Spoken Language Understanding in Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems #### [1] 1115 **5.8K** **26K** Utterance - 4705, 21352 - 1177, 5350 4:1 ``` bash session ID query 1 phone_call.make_a_phone_call 1 music.play 1 music.play || ``` #### : - F1
- #### 16HLSTM-SLUSogou
##### HLSTM-SLU [2]
LSTMLSTMLSTM - Bi-LSTM Character Embedding + POS + Domain POSBIDomainBI
- Session LSTM Bi-LSTM **** - Bi-LSTM Session LSTM + Bi-LSTM **** LSTM **CRF** **Trick**: **over sampling** ****94.19%90.84% ##### Sogou [3] queryquery********5 1. queryPOS 2. querycharacter embedding + word embedding; BILOUCRF 3. character embedding + word embeddingPOSLogistic Regression 4. 5. **XGBoost**word embeddingquery querySogou5001000 ****96.11%94.49% ## ### [Frame](https://datasets.maluuba.com/Frames/dl) #### [4] Wizard-of-Oz(WOz) **1369** , **19986** **** 'author', 'text', 'labels', 'timestamp', 'frames'('frame id', 'frame parent id', 'requests, binary questions, compare requests', 'info'), 'db' 'labels'active_frameAct(actslot) 'info' **Act**inform, offer, request, switch frame, suggest, no result, thankyou, goodbye..... #### Frame TrackingState Trackingframeframeframeframe4
frameActRef LabelsFrame IDframeframe #### ##### Baseline [4] trigramsembeddingtanhActSlotGRUsoftmax
****frame0.24 0.02, frame0.49 0.03 ##### Frame Tracking Model for Memory-Enhanced Dialogue Systems [5] ###### - Token Encodingtrigramshello -> #he, hel, ell, llo, lo#trigramsD-TTrigrams ID - trigramstrigramsembeddingtoken Bidirectional GRU - FrameframeSlotValuetrigramsD-SD-VframeSlot ID, Token ID - ActactActSlotValueactAct ID, Slot ID, Token ID ###### - frames Slot ID, Trigrams ID - Trigrams ID - Act Act ID, Slot ID, Trigrams ID ######
1. framesSlot, TokenGRU256frames\\(m_f\\) |F| \* 256actAct, Slot, Token Bidirectional GRUembedding \\(m_{asv}\\) N \* 256, Nactacts 2. \\(m_f\\) \\(m_{asv}\\) \\(S_m\\) N \* |F|actframeframeactframeactframe \\(S_L\\) actframe S 3. act, slot, value\\(p_{asv, f}\\) framesslotframe 4. actframeact, \\(p_{a, f}\\) actframe ****trick\\(g_c\\) \\(g_n\\) \\(h_d\\) \\(h_c\\) ****76.43 4.49Act95.66 2.34 ### [DSTC](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/event/dialog-state-tracking-challenge/) (Dialog State Tracking Challenge) [6, 7] #### DSTC DSTCDSCT6 - DSTC 1 BUS**12963****2485** - DSTC 2&3 DSTC 1DSTC2**2218****1117**DSTC3**3235****2275**`semantics`slotact ```bash DSTC2 and DSTC3 (Training Set) SYS: Which part of town? USR: The north uh area SYS: Which part of town? USR: A cheap place in the north SYS: Clown cafe is a cheap restaurant in the north part of town. USR: Do you have any others like that? SYS: Galleria is another cheap restaurant in the north. USR: What is their phone number and address? ``` - DSTC 4 Spoken language understandingactsslots5[7]F10.52 - SVM unigrams, bigrams, trigrams - - - DSTC 5 - DSTC 6 #### DSTC2 & 3 - - L21102 #### DSTC3 ##### [8] $$ Y_t^s = Y_{t-1}^s + H_t^s$$\\(H_t^s\\)ts **** \\(P(S_t) = k \sum_{S_{t-1} \in S} P(O^t | S_t) P(S_t | S_{t-1}) P(S_t) \\) \\(P(S_t | O_1^t) = f(O_1^t)\\) \\((P(S_t | O_1^t) = \sum_{S_{t-1} \in S} P(S_t | O_1^t, S_{t-1}) P( S_{t-1} | O_1^{t-1})\\) ****2 - - L20.5760.652 ##### [9]
"Jamaican food" "s=food and v=jamaican" "The Girton area" "s=area and v=girton"L20.6460.534 ##### [10] ** (Markov Bayesian Polynomial, MBP)** (Integer Linear Programming, ILP)L20.6100.556 ##### [11] actactsactL20.6300.627             [1] Overview of the NLPCC 2018 Shared Task: Spoken Language Understanding in Task-Oriented Dialog Systems [2] Learning Dialogue History for Spoken Language Understanding. [3] The Sogou Spoken Language Understanding System for the NLPCC 2018 Evaluation. [4] Frames: A Corpus for Adding Memory to Goal-Oriented Dialogue Systems. [5] A Frame Tracking Model for Memory-Enhanced Dialogue Systems. [6] The Dialog State Tracking Challenge Series: A Review, Learning End-To-End Goal-oriented Dialog. [7] Adobe-MIT submission to the DSTC 4 Spoken Language Understanding pilot task. [8] Markovian discriminative modeling for cross-domain dialog state tracking. [9] Robust Dialog State Tracking Using Delexicalised Recurrent Neural Networks and Unsupervised Adaptation. [10] A generalized rule based tracker for dialogue state tracking. [11] Knowledge-based dialog state tracking.

Post.title: First Step to Establish the Blog
Post._content:
~~~

<!-- more --> 

## Requirement

	brew, hexo, Node.js

### Hexo

``` bash
$ hexo init           # 
$ hexo new "postname" # postname.md
$ hexo clean          # 
$ hexo generate       # 
$ hexo server 	      # 
```

localhost:4000`source``_posts`Markdown

More info: [Heox](https://hexo.io/docs/)

### 

``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

`config.yml`themenextNext
``` bash
auto_excerpt:   #  <!-- more --> , 
  enable: true
  length: 150

busuanzi_count: # 
  enable: true
```

### 

``` bash
$ hexo new page tags   # tags
```

`source``tags``index.md`

```
---
title: tags
date: 2018-10-30 17:23:49
type: "tags"
---
```

`config.yml`menu

```
menu:
  home: /
  archives: /archives
  tags : /tags
```

###  Github

`config.yml`deploy

``` bash
deploy:
  type: git 
  repo: https://github.com/test/test.github.io.git  # github
```


``` bash
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
$ hexo deploy
```

### Google 

1.  Google  [Webmaster Central](https://www.google.com/webmasters/verification/home?hl=en)

2. :  `source` 
``` bash
skip_render: google10bb50e0b38f396b.html
```

3.  sitemap  hexo-generator-sitemap `config.yml`
``` bash
npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save
```
	``` bash
	sitemap:
	    path: sitemap.xml
	```

4. 
``` bash
hexo generate
```
Post.raw:
---
title: First Step to Establish the Blog
categories: Note
tags:
  - Tools
---

## Requirement

	brew, hexo, Node.js

### Hexo

``` bash
$ hexo init           # 
$ hexo new "postname" # postname.md
$ hexo clean          # 
$ hexo generate       # 
$ hexo server 	      # 
```

localhost:4000`source``_posts`Markdown

More info: [Heox](https://hexo.io/docs/)

### 

``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

`config.yml`themenextNext
``` bash
auto_excerpt:   #  <!-- more --> , 
  enable: true
  length: 150

busuanzi_count: # 
  enable: true
```

### 

``` bash
$ hexo new page tags   # tags
```

`source``tags``index.md`

```
---
title: tags
date: 2018-10-30 17:23:49
type: "tags"
---
```

`config.yml`menu

```
menu:
  home: /
  archives: /archives
  tags : /tags
```

###  Github

`config.yml`deploy

``` bash
deploy:
  type: git 
  repo: https://github.com/test/test.github.io.git  # github
```


``` bash
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
$ hexo deploy
```

### Google 

1.  Google  [Webmaster Central](https://www.google.com/webmasters/verification/home?hl=en)

2. :  `source` 
``` bash
skip_render: google10bb50e0b38f396b.html
```

3.  sitemap  hexo-generator-sitemap `config.yml`
``` bash
npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save
```
	``` bash
	sitemap:
	    path: sitemap.xml
	```

4. 
``` bash
hexo generate
```
